text:
We are struggling to handle the overwhelming number of choices available to us. This abundance has made it difficult to determine what truly matters, leading to a loss of focus on important decisions.

The sheer volume of options we face today can be paralyzing. Instead of empowering us, this excess can cloud our judgment and distract us from what is genuinely significant. When there are too many choices, it becomes challenging to prioritize and filter out the noise, resulting in a sense of confusion and indecision. This phenomenon can leave us feeling unprepared and overwhelmed, as we grapple with the difficulty of discerning the essential from the trivial in our lives.

**PAGE SUMMARY:** The overwhelming abundance of choices has impaired our ability to discern what is truly important.
